helpContent.text: Summary of all metrics for the selected filters.
Please click on any summary number to go to more details about that metric.
Any activity for the day.
Users that are Engaged and/or read a message.
Users that have clicked on a message and/or messaged the bot.
Users with activity on the bot for the first time.
Users that we created in our system this day.
Users that blocked messaging from the bot.
Users that had blocked the bot and then started using it again
Average retention of new users X days after being added.
X days since the user was added
Average retention percentage
Average retention of new users on a specific date. This helps see if a
specific change on a specific date impacted usage/retention.
Specific date
Average retention of new users X days after being added.
Percentage of the New Users from a specific day that were active X days later.
Date new users were added.
Count of new users added that day.
Each Day column represents X days since the user was added up to 30.
Average retention of new users X days after being added.
Sum of in and out messages.
All messages from the user to the bot.
All messages from the bot to the user.
All message types.
All messages related to the user signing up for the bot.
All messages related to a user coming in by referral id.
All messages triggered by a tap (on a button or menu).
All messages triggered by typed input from the user.
All messages triggered by a broadcast to a user.
All sessions for that day.
Session where user sent a message or clicked on content.
Average messages per user per day.
Average sessions per user per day.
Average messages per session per day.
Users that have received, sent, or read a message.
All sessions for that day.
Sum of in and out messages.
Percentage of Male users against total users.
Percentage of Female users against total users.
Percentage of users in the selected timezone.
Percentage of users for the selected locale.
Messages sent to users (messages out).
Messages marked as delivered to users.
Messages marked as read by users.
Messages that were engaged with (responded to or clicked).
Shows the time it took between a message being sent and being marked as delivered.
Average delivery time of messages that get delivered in less than 12 hours.
Shows the time it took between a message being delivered and being marked as read.
Average Read time of messages that are read in less than 12 hours.
Shows the time it took between a message being read and being engaged with.
Average Engagement time of messages that are being read and being engaged with in less than 12 hours.
Subscription added in our system this day.
Subscription removed in our system this day.
Shows top 50 nodes based on visits to these nodes and top 50 nodes based on number of clicks.
Shows top 30 actions based on clicks. Actions include buttons, links, quicktext and menu items.
Shows top 50 freeform text messages (not quicktext) sent by the users.
Shows top 50 content items based on clicks.
First time use of reference id by a user.
Repeat use of reference id by a user.
You must select a Node to see the following data:
Top 50 nodes the user came from/was at before the selected node.
Top 50 nodes the user went to from/after the selected node.
Top 10 actions taken from the selected node.
Top 50 text input from the selected node.
